body_html: use placeholder as input to a queue, and the model reads inputs from the queue, then use a session run thread to feed inputs(maybe produced by hadoop mapreduce) to the queue. use staging area you can even hide all preprocessing and input time.
body_text: use placeholder as input to a queue, and the model reads inputs from the queue, then use a session run thread to feed inputs(maybe produced by hadoop mapreduce) to the queue. use staging area you can even hide all preprocessing and input time.
body: use placeholder as input to a queue, and the model reads inputs from the queue, then use a session run thread to feed inputs(maybe produced by hadoop mapreduce) to the queue. use staging area you can even hide all preprocessing and input time.
